desc: InStyle Pillows is a small business that strongly believes in providing products to our customers that offer the best value for their money. Our latest range of outdoor decorative throw pillowcases are mold, mildew, and water resistant and are made using the highest quality linen fabric.

layout.text: Sunshine Collection of Outdoor Decorative Throw Pillowcases

The beautiful shades of yellow on various hues is what defines this collection and brings some sunshine to your décor. These beautiful water, mold and mildew resistant pillowcases will brighten your space.
